snippet: Slumping Texas dropped back into the middle of the A.L. wild-card race as it lost to Oakland. Kansas City and Cleveland picked up ground.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Oakland Athletics beat Texas Rangers, 1-0, stretching their lead to five and a half games in American League West; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Slumping Texas dropped back into the middle of the A.L. wild-card race as it lost to Oakland. Kansas City and Cleveland picked up ground.

headline.main: In A.L. Wild-Card Race, Rangers and Orioles Fall; Rays, Indians and Royals Win
headline.print_headline: In A.L. Wild-Card Race, Rangers and Orioles Fall; Rays, Indians and Royals Win
